oai_dc:dc.dc:description: How a parrot can make the lateral click like a person. (L VIII.29. 8556 rev., note). A parrot seen by |han=kass'o in Mowbray sounds like a person, because it can make the lateral click. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-29.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spoken of a parrot in the village of Mowbray
